extendedInfo.description: Voice Recorder is a new Professional, easy and fun Voice Recorder for Android devices. Use it for record voice notes, talks, music and songs in high quality. Voice recorder can not also be compatible with all devices and configurations, and the recording quality is limited by the quality device's microphone.Help us with translations here: http://crowdin.net/project/voice-recorder-first75Features: â Recording/Playing in 3GPP / AMR / MPEG-4 AAC format â Support stereo recording â Lock-screen widget â Recording in background â Integration with widget (1x1, 3x1, 3x3) â Notification â You can change audio source â Saving voices to media library â Set as ringtone â WakeLock (recording when screen off) â You can change bitrate(5.9 kHz - 44.1 kHz) â informations(record size, storage capacity) â Stopping when low SD Card memoryIf there are any problems, please contact us via e mail.Explanation of the permissions: * Record Audio - Recording audio from your microphone * Modify or delete the contents of your usb storage - saving records to your sd-card * prevent device from sleeping - Allowing recording when screen is off * full network access - allow to showing ads * send sticky broadcast - communication between widget <-> app in background * modify system settings - saving settings

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Great app, a must have on your phone!

reviews.title: Amazing!

reviews.title: Great app

reviews.title: Great app
